SEARCH
Package gw.api.financials

Class FinancialsCalculatorWithReservingAmount

java.lang.Object
gw.api.financials.FinancialsCalculator<FinancialsCalculatorWithReservingAmount>
gw.api.financials.FinancialsCalculatorWithReservingAmount
public class FinancialsCalculatorWithReservingAmount extends FinancialsCalculator<FinancialsCalculatorWithReservingAmount>
A FinancialsCalculatorWithReservingAmount is and extension (subclass) of a FinancialsCalculator which additionally lets the caller ask for the ReservingAmount. It is constructed when withReserveLine() is used on the FinancialsCalculator class
Author:
akurland
